# CheckLengthTag

## InvalidValue

<!-- Description, Properties, ... sections are auto-generated. -->
<!-- REPLACE ME AUTO-GENERATION -->

### Details

The 'Length' tag needs to be an unsigned integer.
When the parameter is of type 'length', the 'Length' tag can not be larger than 4.
